Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Ashburn in 1964...
Injured on 6/11/1964 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/28/1964 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 7/14/1966 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1967, off Steven Hensley (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1967, off Andrew Hutto (GHG)...
Injured on 7/27/1967 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/12/1969 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1969, hitting .429 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1969, hitting .343 with 6 HR, 28 RBI...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1969...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1969...
Injured on 4/19/1970 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Penn on 5/13/1971...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1972, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/4/1973 to a 6-year deal worth $7,200,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Plum Grove on 5/17/1974...
Injured on 6/23/1974 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Northeastern to Syracuse on 2/5/1975 (Going to SYR: P N. Beaufort, LF R. Huynh. Going to NE: LF T. Lary, 2B S. Coots, CF R. Vando, P D. Golden)...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 5/26/1977...
Injured on 8/23/1977 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/4/1979 to a 4-year deal worth $5,700,700 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/22/1981, off Brian Villalobos (NJ)...
